author: Andrew Beaton
title: Breaking Down the NCAA Tournament
text:
After an oddball, uncomfortable and troubling college basketball season—it’s time for the NCAA tournament.
There weren’t any surprises at the top: Everybody seemed to figure Virginia, Villanova, Kansas and Xavier would be the No. 1 seeds.
But that doesn’t mean there weren’t any shocks. And there will certainly be surprises. Nobody knows...
